title: Flipped Learning-Based Mathematics Workforce Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based video content alongside offline practical sessions

learning_goals: Learners can secure over 10 hours of self-directed learning per week through a flipped learning model, improving complex mathematical problem-solving skills by 30%
Learners can strengthen mathematical communication competencies by increasing interaction frequency (over 3 times weekly) with peer practitioners using real-time collaboration tools
Learners achieve job performance results improved by over 25% compared to pre-flipped learning implementation in summative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
